PRODUCTS.title: SLEDGE HAMMER
PRODUCTS.description: A POWERFUL & HEAVY tool used in various applications, primarily for heavy-duty demolition, construction, and industrial tasks!

PRODUCTS.title: TAPE MEASURE
PRODUCTS.description: An AUTO-LOCKING tape measure, has the mechanism that AUTOMATICALLY locks the tape in place once you have extended it to the desired length!

PRODUCTS.title: HAND CHISEL
PRODUCTS.description: Most common used tool for CARRVING & SHAPING hard materials such as Wood, Stone, & Metal!

PRODUCTS.title: INSULATING TAPE
PRODUCTS.description: Commonly used for  INSULATING, PROTECTING, & BUNDLING electrical wires and components!

PRODUCTS.title: HACKSAW FRAME
PRODUCTS.description: Designed to be STURDY & DURABLE to handle HEAVY-DUTY cutting tasks on metal & other tough materials!

PRODUCTS.title: WATER PUMP
PRODUCTS.description: Suitable for a range of RESIDENTIAL, INDUSTRIAL, & AGRICULTURAL applications where reliable water pumping is necessary!

PRODUCTS.title: SANDFLEX BLADES
PRODUCTS.description: Are you tired of struggling with dull, unreliable hacksaw blades that slow you down on your projects? Look no further! This Hacksaw Blade is engineered to REVOLUTIONIZE your cutting experience

PRODUCTS.title: CUTTING DISCS
PRODUCTS.description: Commonly used in various industries & applications which require PRECISE cutting of hard materials, such as BRICK, STONE, MARBLE, TILES, & MASONRY!

PRODUCTS.title: WINDOW FASTENERS
PRODUCTS.description: Window fasteners serve several purposes, such as enhancing security by PREVENTING unauthorized access, IMPROVING energy efficiency by sealing gaps, & allowing for CONTROLLED ventilation!

PRODUCTS.title: ANGLE VALVES
PRODUCTS.description: Commonly used to stop & control the flow of a fluid in a pipe, allowing you to make repairs EASILY without having to cut down the water in your entire plumbing system!

PRODUCTS.title: PLASTERING TROWEL
PRODUCTS.description: This is the most common trowel when it comes to installing TILES & HARDWOOD; designed to leave notches in the adhesive allowing air to escape when the tile is pressed into for BETTER adhesion!

PRODUCTS.title: STOP COCK
PRODUCTS.description: Suitable for environments with low water pressure. Developed for African conditions that ensure products LONGEVITY against the presence of LEAD & NICKET!

PRODUCTS.title: EAR PLUGS
PRODUCTS.description: Ear plugs are generally used in the workplace to help PROTECT the userâ€™s ears from loud noises, intrusion of water, foreign bodies, dust or excessive wind. Exposure to loud noise in the workplace can lead to LOSS of hearing and/ or tinnitus (a permanent ringing in the ears)!

PRODUCTS.title: TILE CUTTER
PRODUCTS.description: Now you can finally SHARPEN your tile cutter as sharp as you want to give you the perfect cut you need. Easy to handle, easy to carry! Other types of tile cutters also AVAILABLE!

PRODUCTS.title: GATE LATCHES
PRODUCTS.description: Gate latches are an essential component for most doors & gates. They serve to both open & shut the gate, as well as helping to secure the property! Introducing in BRAND NEW CHROME COLOR!.

PRODUCTS.title: FLAP DISK
PRODUCTS.description: Commonly used for GRINDING & SMOOTHING metal welds, SHAPING & POLISHING wood surfaces, REMOVING RUST & PAINT, & preparing surfaces before welding or adhesive bonding!

PRODUCTS.title: TIN MAN SNIP
PRODUCTS.description: The BEST hand tool for cutting METAL SHEETS & TOUGH PLASTICS. Tin man snips look similar to ordinary scissors; however, they are much STRONGER & allow for more PRECISE CUTTING!
